      physarum---Physarum polycephalum slime mold simulation

      javascript-algorithms---📝 Algorithms and data structures implemented in JavaScript with explanations and links to further readings

alexgurr /

      react-coding-challenges---A series of ReactJS coding challenges with a variety of difficulties.

public-apis /

      public-apis---A collective list of free APIs such as http://ipstack.com, http://fixer.io/, https://numverify.com/, etc. for use in software and web development.

MarlinFirmware /

      Marlin---Marlin is an optimized firmware for RepRap 3D printers based on the Arduino platform. | Many commercial 3D printers come with Marlin installed. Check with your vendor if you need source code for your specific machine.

lnishan /

      awesome-competitive-programming---💎 A curated list of awesome Competitive Programming, Algorithm and Data Structure resources

lydiahallie /

      javascript-questions---A long list of (advanced) JavaScript questions, and their explanations ✨

ventoy /

      Ventoy---A new bootable USB solution.

davidbombal /

      red-python-scripts---

Asabeneh /

      30-Days-Of-React---30 Days of React challenge is a step by step guide to learn React in 30 days. It requires HTML, CSS, and JavaScript knowledge. You should be comfortable with JavaScript before you start to React. If you are not comfortable with JavaScript check out 30DaysOfJavaScript. This is a continuation of 30 Days Of JS. This challenge may take up to 100 day…

storm-devs /

      storm-engine---Game engine behind Sea Dogs, Pirates of the Caribbean and Age of Pirates games.

mentebinaria /

      retoolkit---Reverse Engineer's Toolkit

lucidrains /

      deep-daze---Simple command line tool for text to image generation using OpenAI's CLIP and Siren (Implicit neural representation network)

carlospolop /

      privilege-escalation-awesome-scripts-suite---PEASS - Privilege Escalation Awesome Scripts SUITE (with colors)

davepl /

      Primes---Prime Number Projects in C#/C++/Python

sebastianruder /

      NLP-progress---Repository to track the progress in Natural Language Processing (NLP), including the datasets and the current state-of-the-art for the most common NLP tasks.

morpheusthewhite /

      spicetify-themes---A community-driven collection of themes for Spicetify (https://github.com/khanhas/spicetify-cli)

signalapp /

      Signal-iOS---A private messenger for iOS.

MarlinFirmware /

      Configurations---Configurations for Marlin Firmware

freddier /

      hyperblog---Un blog increíble para el curso de Git y Github de Platzi

iamadamdev /

      bypass-paywalls-chrome---Bypass Paywalls web browser extension for Chrome and Firefox.

neovim /

      neovim---Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability
